title: Craft Supplies Quiz
description: Do you know your craft supplies? Test your knowledge of materials used in arts, crafts, and creative projects.

questions.question: What craft supply is a thin, flexible wire covered in fuzzy fiber, often used by children for crafts?
Which adhesive is a milky white glue that dries clear, commonly used for paper and wood crafts?
What craft tool uses heated adhesive sticks to bond materials together?
Which craft material is a moldable, air-drying clay often used for children's projects?
What are googly eyes in crafting?
options: Small plastic discs with a movable pupil, glued onto crafts for a fun face

questions.question: Which craft supply is a thin sheet of colored or patterned foam, often sold in letter-size sheets?
What is decoupage?
options: The art of decorating surfaces by gluing paper cutouts and sealing with varnish

questions.question: Which small, shiny disc-shaped items are sewn or glued onto fabric for sparkle and decoration?
What is Mod Podge commonly used for in crafting?
options: Serving as an all-in-one glue, sealer, and finish for decoupage

questions.question: Which craft material is a stiff, heavy paper that is thicker than standard paper but thinner than cardboard?
What is a brayer used for in crafting?
options: Rolling ink or paint onto surfaces evenly

questions.question: Which craft supply is a frame used to hold fabric taut for embroidery?
What are perler beads (fuse beads)?
options: Small plastic beads arranged on a pegboard and melted together with an iron

questions.question: Which tool is a small, sharp blade in a pen-like handle used for precision cutting in paper crafts?
What is gesso used for in art and crafts?
options: Priming and preparing surfaces for painting
